channel.title: I've lost the sound.
channel.description: Okay, so I was playing, reaching the part when the vortigaunt appears for the first time. And then the sounds shut down. I don't have sound in Windows anymore. It sounds pretty fucked up, I know. Maybe if I restart the computer I have sound again. I haven't tried yet, anyways, that's a weird bug, isn't it?

item.title: I've lost the sound.
item.dc:creator: Joe_Freeman
item.description:
Okay, so this must sound retarded. I actually turned downed the volume of the loudspeakers accidentally with my foot, but I didn’t realise until now. SORRY.

Read full topic

item.title: I've lost the sound.
item.dc:creator: Joe_Freeman
item.description:
Yes, there’s no sound even after restarting the computer. Something strange happened.

P.D: You’ll think that this doesn’t have anything to do with the game. Actually before that happened the game froze for a second, so I think it’s really got something to do with my issue.

Read full topic
